query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
4 disse per confortarmi: «Non ti noccia 5 la tua paura; ché, poder ch’elli abbia, 6 non ci torrà lo scender questa roccia».
query.error: **English:** 4 said to comfort me: "Do not let 5 your fear harm you; for, whatever power he has, 6 he will not prevent us from descending this rock."
query.result: 4 a leveris rag dhe'm gallosow: "Na wra 5 agha dhe'th ogas; rag, pooth owth esa, 6 ev a wra'n lettya ni dhe'n garrek ma."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
7 Poi si rivolse a quella ’nfiata labbia, 8 e disse: «Taci, maladetto lupo! 9 consuma dentro te con la tua rabbia.
query.error: **English:** 7 Then he turned to that swollen snout, 8 and said: "Be silent, cursed wolf! 9 Consume yourself with your own rage.
query.result: 7 Wosa henna a droes dhe'n genow swoles, 8 ha leveris: "Sew, blewas maledictow! 9 Devora dhe'th honan gans dhe'th growt."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
10 Non è sanza cagion l’andare al cupo: 11 vuolsi ne l’alto, là dove Michele 12 fé la vendetta del superbo strupo».
query.error: **English:** 10 It is not without reason that we go to the depths: 11 we must go up high, where Michael 12 took vengeance for the proud rebel.
query.result: 10 Nyns yw heb resen an mos dhe'n downder: 11 moy yw dhe'n ughel, le mayth Michael 12 a wrug venjans rag an rebel breus."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
13 Quali dal vento le gonfiate vele 14 caggiono avvolte, poi che l’alber fiacca, 15 tal cadde a terra la fiera crudele.
query.error: **English:** 13 Like sails filled with wind 14 that fall twisted when the mast breaks, 15 so the fierce beast fell to the ground.
query.result: 13 Kepar hwyli lowen gwyns 14 a wra dhesempys, pan voel an pren, 15 hemma dhesempys an best gwyls dhe'n dor.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
16 Così scendemmo ne la quarta lacca, 17 pigliando più de la dolente ripa 18 che ’l mal de l’universo tutto insacca.
query.error: **English:** 16 Thus we descended into the fourth chasm, 17 taking more of the sorrowful bank 18 that ensnares the evil of the entire universe.
query.result: 16 Hemma a dhyskynnas dhe'n peswora lag, 17 ow kemeres moy a'n glann dowrus, 18 ow kwytha an drok a'n bys vyth oll.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
19 Ahi giustizia di Dio! tante chi stipa 20 nove travaglie e pene quant’ io viddi? 21 e perché nostra colpa sì ne scipa?
query.error: **English:** 19 Ah, justice of God! How many new 20 travails and punishments did I see 21 that crowd and cram this place?
query.result: 19 Ah, jystyans Dew! Pandra chi fyl 20 anow trevesow ha poennow a welas? 21 Ha perak an pechodh ny skorra ni?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
22 Come fa l’onda là sovra Cariddi, 23 che si frange con quella in cui s’intoppa, 24 così convien che qui la gente riddi.
query.error: **English:** 22 And why does our fault so waste us away? 23 Like the wave that breaks against Charybdis, 24 crashing against the one it meets,
query.result: 22 Kepar an tonn owth usi Cariddi, 23 owth torra gans an hini a wra dhesempys, 24 hemma dhefens an bobel ow riddi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
25 Qui vid’ i’ gente più ch’altrove troppa, 26 e d’una parte e d’altra, con grand’ urli, 27 voltando pesi per forza di poppa.
query.error: **English:** 25 Here I saw more people than elsewhere, 26 and on each side, with great howls, 27 they were pushing weights by force of their chests.
query.result: 25 Ama welas moy bobel ages le may, 26 ha warbarth ha'n nessa, gans grow ankow, 27 ow trohe pesow gans nerth aga brest.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Cornish.
28 Percotëansi ’ncontro; e poscia pur lì 29 si rivolgea ciascun, voltando a retro, 30 gridando: «Perché tieni?» e «Perché burli?».
query.error: **English:** 28 They would strike each other, and then right there 29 each would turn around, facing backward, 30 shouting: “Why are you holding back?” and “Why are you pushing?”
query.result: 28 Aga'n skeusya yn-nans; ha wosa hemma 29 aga'n trohe, ow treylya dhe'n nessa, 30 ow kewsel: “Perak ow terj?” ha “Perak ow burj?”.

query.result: 31 Hemma a dheuth dhe'n kelgh tewl 32 a pub tu dhe'n poynt owth esa nessa, 33 ow kewsel aga'n gerensow mes.

query.prompt:

query.result: 43 Kler o lav anow yw aga hav, 44 pub travia dheus dhe'n dew benn an kelgh, 45 le mayth fylhow gwrys aga dhegemergh.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

query.result: 52 Ha henna dhymm: "An kov a wravyth: 53 an byw anserghek a wra hwella, 54 a wra henna du dhe bub gnasow".
